attributes.action: spend public money on proven adult stem cell research, rather than wasting it on unproven unethical embyro research
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop more adult stem cell scientists leaving the UK. The funding of this proven work that delivers real health benefits to people in the UK,  is being overshadowed by the governments obsession with unproven animal-hybrid  stem cell research. The measures passed recently in the Human Fertilisation & Embryology Bill are destined to be at best an embarrassing footnote in our history.
